question: Income that is subject to taxation is called _ income.
The _ method involves using physical envelopes of cash for different spending categories.
A _ is a savings certificate with a fixed maturity date and interest rate.
The Rule of 72 states that you can estimate how long it will take to double your money by dividing 72 by the annual _ rate.
The debt _ method prioritizes paying off debts with the highest interest rates first.
A _ is an amount you must pay out-of-pocket before your insurance coverage kicks in.
A _ tax bracket means only income above a certain threshold is taxed at that rate.
The _ ratio is calculated by dividing your total credit used by your total available credit.
The _ ensures bank deposits are protected up to a certain limit if the bank fails.
A _ scheme pays returns to earlier investors using money from new investors rather than profit.
